00026 /*
00027  *
00028  * Network Request Scheduler (NRS) Object-based Round Robin and Target-based
00029  * Round Robin (ORR and TRR) policies
00030  *
00031  */
00032 
00033 #ifndef _LUSTRE_NRS_ORR_H
00034 #define _LUSTRE_NRS_ORR_H
00035 
00039 enum nrs_ctl_orr {
00040         NRS_CTL_ORR_RD_QUANTUM = PTLRPC_NRS_CTL_1ST_POL_SPEC,
00041         NRS_CTL_ORR_WR_QUANTUM,
00042         NRS_CTL_ORR_RD_OFF_TYPE,
00043         NRS_CTL_ORR_WR_OFF_TYPE,
00044         NRS_CTL_ORR_RD_SUPP_REQ,
00045         NRS_CTL_ORR_WR_SUPP_REQ,
00046 };
00047 
00058 struct nrs_orr_req_range {
00059         __u64           or_start;
00060         __u64           or_end;
00061 };
00062 
00066 enum nrs_orr_supp {
00067         NOS_OST_READ  = (1 << 0),
00068         NOS_OST_WRITE = (1 << 1),
00069         NOS_OST_RW    = (NOS_OST_READ | NOS_OST_WRITE),
00073         NOS_DFLT      = NOS_OST_READ
00074 };
00075 
00084 struct nrs_orr_key {
00085         union {
00087                 struct lu_fid   ok_fid;
00089                 __u32           ok_idx;
00090         };
00091 };
00092 
00102 #define NRS_ORR_OBJ_NAME_MAX    (sizeof("nrs_orr_reg_") + 3)
00103 
00107 struct nrs_orr_data {
00108         struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource      od_res;
00109         struct cfs_binheap             *od_binheap;
00110         struct cfs_hash                *od_obj_hash;
00111         struct kmem_cache              *od_cache;
00116         __u64                           od_round;
00121         __u64                           od_sequence;
00125         enum nrs_orr_supp               od_supp;
00130         __u16                           od_quantum;
00134         bool                            od_physical;
00143         char                            od_objname[NRS_ORR_OBJ_NAME_MAX];
00144 };
00145 
00150 struct nrs_orr_object {
00151         struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource      oo_res;
00152         struct hlist_node               oo_hnode;
00157         __u64                           oo_round;
00162         __u64                           oo_sequence;
00167         struct nrs_orr_key              oo_key;
00168         long                            oo_ref;
00173         __u16                           oo_quantum;
00177         __u16                           oo_active;
00178 };
00179 
00183 struct nrs_orr_req {
00187         struct nrs_orr_req_range        or_range;
00192         __u64                           or_round;
00197         __u64                           or_sequence;
00201         struct nrs_orr_key              or_key;
00206         unsigned int                    or_orr_set:1;
00211         unsigned int                    or_trr_set:1;
00216         unsigned int                    or_logical_set:1;
00221         unsigned int                    or_physical_set:1;
00222 };
00223 
00225 #endif
